LanguageData.BionicHand.label: bionic hand
LanguageData.BionicHand.description: An installed bionic hand. Allows the user to perform tasks even faster than with regular hands.
LanguageData.BionicFoot.label: bionic Foot
LanguageData.BionicFoot.description: An installed bionic Foot. Grants faster walking without stumbling all the time.
LanguageData.BionicEar.label: bionic ear
LanguageData.BionicEar.description: An installed advanced device that expands upon the basic functions of the ear drum.
LanguageData.BionicJaw.label: bionic jaw implant
LanguageData.BionicJaw.description: An installed strong set of teeth, this also comes with a voice modulator.
LanguageData.BionicSpine.label: bionic spine
LanguageData.BionicSpine.description: An installed light and impressing bionic spine.
LanguageData.BionicEye.label: bionic eye
LanguageData.BionicEye.description: An installed bionic eye. Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
LanguageData.BionicArm.label: bionic arm
LanguageData.BionicArm.description: An installed bionic arm. One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. It gives extreme strength to its user.
LanguageData.BionicArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: fist
LanguageData.BionicLeg.label: bionic leg
LanguageData.BionicLeg.description: An installed bionic leg. Uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
LanguageData.PowerClaw.label: power claw
LanguageData.PowerClaw.description: An installed powerful hand replacement consisting of three deadly claws.
LanguageData.PowerClaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: claw
LanguageData.BrainStimulator.label: brain stimulator
LanguageData.BrainStimulator.description: An installed small device that sends electric shocks to the brain to slightly boost consciousness and mobility.
LanguageData.AIChip.label: AI chip
LanguageData.AIChip.description: An installed little chip is able to significantly boost the users consciousness and mobility.
